name: Super Energy Removal
text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your own Pokémon in order to choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon and up to 2 Energy cards attached to it. Discard those Energy cards.

effect.text: Discard 1 Energy card attached to 1 of your own Pokémon in order to choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon and up to 2 Energy cards attached to it. Discard those Energy cards.

strengths: Remove up to 2 Energy from opponent
weaknesses: Net loss of 1 Energy for 2 removed

competitiveHistory: Super Energy Removal was one of the most powerful disruption cards, creating the energy denial strategy that dominated early competitive play.

rulings.ruling: You must discard 1 Energy from your own Pokemon to use this card.
You can choose to discard 0, 1, or 2 Energy cards from the opponent's Pokemon.
You choose which of your opponent's Pokemon to target.
